content: kay & dan jones handbrake for personal use only - do not reproduce bakerybears@btinternet com page 2 cast on using the long tail cast on method cast on 120 stitches place a stitch marker and then join for knitting in the round taking care not to twist the work if you would like to knit a longer cowl so you can wrap it around your neck twice then i suggest you cast on 220 stitches please be aware that you will need 2 skeins if you knit this larger size you will need to use a 32 inch circular needle if you knit this larger version pattern set up border round 1 - k4 p1 around round 2 - knit all stitches round 1 - knit all stitches round 3 - p1 k4 p1 to last 4 stitches k4 round 2 - purl all stitches round 4 - knit all stitches repeat these two rounds 4 more times you will now have 5 garter ridges round 5 - k1 p1 k4 p1 to last 3 stitches k3 knit one more round round 6 - knit all stitches round 7 - k2 p1 k4 p1 to last 2 stitches k2 round 8 - knit all stitches round 9 - k3 p1 k4 p1 to last stitch k1 round 10 - knit all stitches repeat these 10 row until your work measures approx 7 inches you can end on any of the pattern row but ensure your last round is a knit round please note - where you see stitches within brackets e g k4 p1 you should repeat these until you reach the number of remaining stitches stated © 2015 kay & dan jones handbrake for personal use only - do not reproduce bakerybears@btinternet com page 3 bind off top border you will need to work a bind off that has a little round 1 - knit all stitches stretch so i like to use the following method round 2 - purl all stitches knit 2 stitches together through the back loop and repeat these two rounds 4 more times you will then place that decreased stitch back on the left have 5 garter ridges to match the border at the hand needle repeat this process to the end of bottom the round you can of course use whatever stretchy bind off you prefer knit one more round weave in your yarn ends wash and block your lovely finished cowl and you are done video links 1 casting on https //www youtube com/watch v=wsghkz4rg34 2 knit stitch https //www youtube com/watch v=_p23nsw6qsk 3 purl stitch https //www youtube com/watch v=u2qpkj0aq0g 4 pattern start https //www youtube com/watch v=7fidezlyhju 5 bind off https //www youtube com/watch v=cghitywr1us 6 you can only access your special podcast episode by using this url https //www youtube com/watch v=lmzdqj80ty8 © 2015 kay & dan jones handbrake for personal use only -
